alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen; Huntington; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:57PM EDT until April 01 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN ALLEN...EASTERN HUNTINGTON...WELLS AND ADAMS COUNTIES... At 1157 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monroeville to near Bluffton to 8 miles north of Montpelier, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bluffton, Decatur, Ossian, Markle, Monroe, Warren, Preble, Zanesville, Uniondale, Vera Cruz, Yoder, Murray, Liberty Center, Peterson, Buckeye, Tocsin, Kingsland, Rivare, Magley and Travisville. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 277 and 294. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
